name: Lead The Goo Down
description:
Lead The Goo Down (LTGD):

Welcome to my submission for the Let's Talk Game Design 2022 Game Jam!

LTGD is an infinite runner with a twist! Build up momentum to break through obstacles to try and collect as many coins as you can!

Another Twist! Periodically an enemy will attempt to kill you do your best to get it first and avoid dying!.

Controls:
  • A, Left Arrow - Move Left
  • D ,Right Arrow - Move Right

In depth tutorial in game

FAQ:
  • Why does it say Goblin?
    • The player was supposed to be a goblin. Unfortunately I can't draw.. so now its a Goo orb that looks like a marble
Known Bugs

Hopefully they don't ruin the entire experience

  • Some of the platforms double up in spots at random so some accesible options may just kill you
  • Also sometimes the path forward may be completley blocked.. and you'll get a game over
  • Sometimes you can move through the bound of the level but if you quick enough you can make it back in before a game over
